about_the_game: Pawełek The Game is an open-world adventure in which you play the titular Pawełek. who is looking for his missing Anime little girl. personalize your character, choose from 4 classes. and fight different opponents. The relationships you form and the choices you make will influence your story. and visit places like HeidenRoft, Ilekton, anosira, rehfel or even NOVIGRAD itself! Your adventure is just beginning

content_descriptors.notes: The game presents. violence, swearing, name-calling, racism, things like alcohol, drugs and much more, so the game is only for people 18+

detailed_description:
Early Beta Access!

.
After release, the game will first be in beta access.
SO PLEASE BE CAREFUL, EVERYTHING YOU SEE IS IN BETA VERSION! with the full version everything will be changed.


Choose Between 4 different Classes !

.
Choose from 4 different classes. thanks to which each game experience will be different!
Each class has its own unique abilities, weapons and companions!


EXPLORE THE FIRST OF MANY STORIES FROM THE CHRONICLES!

This is the first game in the Tales from the Chronicles series. which tells about Pawełek's adventures, but you can expect the series to be expanded with new games in the future.


About the Game

Pawełek The Game is an open-world adventure in which you play the titular Pawełek. who is looking for his missing Anime little girl. personalize your character, choose from 4 classes. and fight different opponents. The relationships you form and the choices you make will influence your story. and visit places like HeidenRoft, Ilekton, anosira, rehfel or even NOVIGRAD itself! Your adventure is just beginning
name: Pawelek The Game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core3 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:

Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Pawełek The Game is a game full of challenges, jokes and twists. Take on the role of a pawelek, craft items, fight and earn new Loot and uncover the truth about your love
